授業目的: This course prepares students for academic research leading to the commencement of writing of their senior theses.
到達目標: By taking this course, students will gain the necessary skills for researching for and writing of their senior theses.
授業方法: Class discussions, presentations, writing assignments. Zoom lessons for students who have received permission to study online.
